casebody.data:
Bolton et al., Appellants, v. Schriever et al., Respondents. (Superior Court of New York City, General Term. December 14, 1891.) ' Appeal from special term. Action by C. Gray Dolton and another against William Schriever and oth-ers. For former report, see 12 N. Y. Supp. 226, 918.

Argued before Freedman, McAdam, and Gildersleeve, JJ.

Smith & Perkins, for appellants. Johnson & Johnson, for respondents. Per Curiam.

Order appealed from affirmed, with $10 costs. •
